content: left to right single_crochet = single_crochet increase = make 2 single_crochet in this stitch d = single_crochet 2 stitches together popcorn = popcorn shift = shift stitch at end of current row pattern by thalia evans this pattern is intended for personal use to make random acts of crochet kindness please give credit where appropriate and do not reuse the photos in this document if you use bead or safety eyes the finished item will not be suitable for children under 3 due to small parts www woollytea carrd co 13
